title: Evening Glow
marks: Signature LR in brown: [Emil Nolde]; on verso (stretcher) in
provenance:
Paul and Martha Rauert, Hamburg, Germany in 1917. Gouthier collection, Brussels, Belgium. Myrtle Frank, New York, New York. (The New Gallery, New York, New York by 1959);[1] Donald and Elizabeth Martin Winston, Wayzata, Minnesota and Los Angeles, California in 1959 through 1962;[2] gift to MIA in 1962.

[1] Interview with Eugene V. Thaw, The Art Newspaper, October 1994, no. 41.

[2] Invoice in curatorial file states that Winston purchased the work from the New Gallery on May 2, 1959.
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Donald Winston
